hero-desc: Building fast, responsive, and highly functional websites with a perfect blend of elegant design and optimal performance for the best user experience.
slogan: Building Digital Dreams, One Code at a Time.

description.aboutme: I am a vocational high school graduate in Computer and Network Engineering with satisfactory results. During school, I participated in a field practice program (PKL) in fiber optic networking, which deepened my understanding of network infrastructure and provided practical experience.
description.currentwork: I am currently a Junior Web Developer at PT Belanja Pasti Indonesia, responsible for developing and maintaining web applications with a focus on intuitive UI design and performance optimization. I continuously explore new technologies to enhance my skills in the ever-evolving field of web development.
description.educatedesc: I specialized in Network System Administration during my education, focusing on network device configuration, troubleshooting, and system management. Additionally, I studied Network Infrastructure Administration and Network Service Technology. I further honed my expertise by participating in the Yogyakarta Province Student Competency Competition (LKS) for IT Network System Administration in 2023, which enhanced my technical knowledge and practical skills in the field.
description.webdevdesc: I have actively contributed to the development of various web projects. To date, I have participated in three major projects, primarily focusing on front-end development by implementing user interfaces based on designs from the creative team. Additionally, I have experience managing databases, integrating APIs, and handling front-end tasks to ensure seamless and functional web solutions.

saya-dapat-membantu-anda: Effective Web Solutions â€“ I'm Here to Assist!

home.about-desc: I am a vocational school graduate with experience and knowledge in the IT field. Currently, I work as a Web Developer, developing and maintaining web applications to enhance functionality and user experience.
home.about-subdesc: The blend of my passion for design, coding, and interaction places me in a unique position in the world of web design.
